kw.name: New Browser
kw.doc: Create a new playwright Browser with specified options. See `Browser, Context and Page` for more information about Browser and related concepts.
kw.msg: {"browser": "chromium", "headless": false, "handleSIGINT": true, "handleSIGTERM": true, "handleSIGHUP": true, "timeout": 30000.0, "devtools": false, "slowMo": 0.0}
Successfully created browser with options: {"browser":"chromium","headless":false,"handleSIGINT":true,"handleSIGTERM":true,"handleSIGHUP":true,"timeout":30000,"devtools":false,"slowMo":0}

kw.name: New Page
kw.doc: Open a new Page. A Page is the Playwright equivalent to a tab. See `Browser, Context and Page` for more information about Page concept. Returns a stable identifier for the created page.
kw.msg: Successfully initialized new page object and opened url: https://www.amazon.com.br/

kw.name: Wait For Elements State
kw.doc: Waits for the element found by ``selector`` to satisfy state option.
kw.msg: Wait for Element with selector: css=#nav-link-accountList-nav-line-1

kw.name: Get Text
kw.doc: Returns text attribute of the element found by ``selector``. See the `Finding elements` section for details about the selectors.

kw.name: Wait For Elements State
kw.doc: Waits for the element found by ``selector`` to satisfy state option.
kw.msg: Wait for Element with selector: css=#twotabsearchtextbox

kw.name: Fill Text
kw.doc: Clears and fills the given ``text`` into the text field found by ``selector``.
kw.msg: Fills the text 'notebook' in the given field.

kw.name: Click
kw.doc: Simulates mouse click on the element found by ``selector``.

kw.name: Get Text
kw.doc: Returns text attribute of the element found by ``selector``. See the `Finding elements` section for details about the selectors.

kw.name: Selecionar primeiro item da lista de resultados
Get Text
kw.doc: Returns text attribute of the element found by ``selector``. See the `Finding elements` section for details about the selectors.
kw.msg: ${produtoSelecionado} = Notebook Dell Inspiron i15-3501-A25P 15.6" HD 10ª Geração Intel Core i3 4GB 256GB SSD Windows 10 Preto

kw.name: Click
kw.doc: Simulates mouse click on the element found by ``selector``.

kw.name: Wait For Elements State
kw.doc: Waits for the element found by ``selector`` to satisfy state option.
kw.msg: Wait for Element with selector: css=#productTitle

kw.name: Get Text
kw.doc: Returns text attribute of the element found by ``selector``. See the `Finding elements` section for details about the selectors.
kw.msg: ${produtoExibido} = Notebook Dell Inspiron i15-3501-A25P 15.6" HD 10ª Geração Intel Core i3 4GB 256GB SSD Windows 10 Preto

kw.name: Should Be Equal
kw.doc: Fails if the given objects are unequal.

kw.name: Take Screenshot
kw.doc: Takes a screenshot of the current window and saves it to ``path``. Saves it as a png.
